pages.text: Craft some Wood Enhanced Jadeite Bricks.$(br2)They act as a kind of crafting material.

Craft a Wood Enhanced Hokora.$(br)Right-click or use a hopper to send required items inside, to transform into 5 Reiyoku per item.$(br)The required items are Sweet Berries for Wood, Wheat for Fire, Rice Ear for Earth, Green Onion for Metal, and Soy Beans for Water.
Craft a Jadeite Wood Element Altar. The usage is as same as the Birch Altars.$(br2)Not only Tier 1 recipes, it can also craft a lot more Tier 2 recipes.
In Tier 2, Ambers of each element can be easily crafted, by 4 flints on a Jadeite Altar. This makes doing magic much easier.
